changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.description: Update your password to keep your account secure

validation.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.number: Password must contain at least one number
validation.specialChar: Password must contain at least one special character

fileExplorer.title: Document Explorer
fileExplorer.deleteConfirmationDescription: This action cannot be undone. The file will be deleted and all related data will be removed.

uploadDocument.title: Upload Documents
uploadDocument.description: Upload one or more documents to the system
uploadDocument.atLeastOneFile: You must select at least one file
uploadDocument.invalidFileTypeForSamplesWellsSubstances: For wells, substances and samples, only Excel files (.xlsx or .xlsm) are allowed
uploadDocument.fileTooLarge: The maximum allowed file size is 10MB
uploadDocument.dragMoreFiles: Drag more files or click to add
uploadDocument.dragAndDropFiles: Drag and drop your files here or

noData.title: No data available
noData.description: There is no data matching the selected filters. Try adjusting the date range or filters to see results.
noData.kpisDescription: There are no metrics to display with the current filters. Try adjusting the date range or filters.
noData.mapDescription: There is no spatial data to display with the current filters. Try adjusting the filters to see results on the map.

boxplot.defaultTooltip: This chart shows how the concentrations behave in each year, allowing you to see if the values tend to be more dispersed or more close to each other with time.

kpi.percentageToGuidelineTooltip: Percentage variation of the last average value compared to the guideline level. A negative value indicates that it is below the guideline level.
kpi.percentageToMaximumTooltip: Percentage variation of the last average value compared to the maximum historical value. A negative value indicates that it is below the maximum historical value.

errors.kpisError: Error loading KPIs. Please try again.
errors.lineChartError: Error loading chart. Please try again.
errors.boxplotError: Error loading chart. Please try again.
errors.mapError: Error loading map. Please try again.

table.total: {count, plural, =0 {No records} =1 {1 record in total} other {# records in total}}.
table.selected: {selected, plural, =0 {No records selected} =1 {1 record selected} other {# records selected}} of {total}.

validation.title: Analytical validation
validation.description: Validate the documents of samples made by the laboratory.

upload.error: Please upload the three required files
upload.fileTooLarge: The maximum allowed file size is 10MB
upload.fileInvalidType: Only Excel files (.xlsx or .xls) are allowed
upload.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your Excel file here

results.title: Validation results
results.noResults: No validations with status '{status}' to show.

existingWells.success: All wells exist in the database
existingWells.error: The following wells do not exist in the database
existingWells.skipped: All wells exist in the database

sampleId.success: The sample names comply with the standard
sampleId.error: The sample names do not comply with the standard
sampleId.skipped: The sample names do not comply with the standard

requiredColumns.success: The document has the required columns
requiredColumns.error: The columns {columns} were not found in the document

rangeValues.success: The column {column} has values within the allowed range [{min_value}, {max_value}]
rangeValues.warning: The column {column} has values outside the allowed range [{min_value}, {max_value}]
rangeValues.skipped: The document has values within the allowed range

holdingTime.success: The holding time is correct for all parameters
holdingTime.error: The holding time is incorrect for some parameters
holdingTime.skipped: The holding time is correct for all parameters

guidelineLevel.success: The concentrations of the parameters do not exceed the guideline levels
guidelineLevel.warning: The concentrations of the parameters exceed the guideline levels
guidelineLevel.skipped: The concentrations of the parameters do not exceed the guideline levels

equality.success: The preliminar and EDD files of the laboratory are equal
equality.error: The preliminar and EDD files of the laboratory are not equal
equality.skipped: The preliminar and EDD files of the laboratory are equal

duplicidadPreliminar.success: The duplicated samples comply with the duplication criteria
duplicidadPreliminar.warning: The duplicated samples {original} and {duplicado} do not comply with the duplication criteria
duplicidadPreliminar.skipped: The duplicated samples comply with the duplication criteria

duplicidadPreliminarNoRPD.warning: The measurements of {original} and {duplicado} do not exceed the RL2 or RL5 thresholds. Requires the analyst's criteria.

matrixSpike.success: The recovery percentages of the matrix spike samples are within the allowed limits
matrixSpike.warning: The recovery percentages of the matrix spike samples are not within the allowed limits
matrixSpike.skipped: The recovery percentages of the matrix spike samples are within the allowed limits

matrixSpikeDuplicates.success: The matrix spike duplicate samples comply with the duplication criteria
matrixSpikeDuplicates.warning: The matrix spike duplicate samples do not comply with the duplication criteria
matrixSpikeDuplicates.skipped: The matrix spike duplicate samples comply with the duplication criteria

missing.success: The samples are in the preliminar and EDD files
missing.skipped: The samples are in the preliminar and EDD files

edd.error: The following sample and substance combinations in the EDD are not in the preliminar

preliminar.error: The following sample and substance combinations in the preliminar are not in the EDD

auth.termsAndPrivacy: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

tenant.noProjectAccess: You do not have access to any project.
tenant.noProjectAccessError: Error selecting project. Please try again.
